description: Mid-term test assessing topics from lectures and tutorials, focusing on problem solving, logical reasoning, and proofs. Conducted in Week 8 with 1-hour duration.
Supervised 2-hour 10-minute exam covering all course topics, including theory and practical applications of complex analysis. Includes questions on integral theorems, residues, and real integrals.

Combines online Mobius quizzes (10% weight for best 7/9 quizzes) and tutorial engagement (5% weight for active participation in 7/9 sessions). Focuses on foundational knowledge and collaborative problem-solving.
